english.segment1: Verse 1: Children of the living God come and sing sing out loud children of the living God Sing to the Living God
english.segment2: Verse 2: Sing of the wonders he has made bird in flight falling rain. Sing of the wonders he has made sing to the living God
english.segment3: Chorus: How he loves us with great love he who sits enthroned above for our lives he spilled his blood sent his spirit like a flood Children of the Living God sing to the living God
english.segment4: Verse 3: Sing of his gentle healing hands how they found the lowliest man sing of his gentle healing hands sing to the living God
english.segment5: Verse 4: Sing of the mercy that he gives though we sin he forgives sing of the mercy that he gives sing to the living God (Chorus)
english.segment6: Verse 5: (strum chord once). Sing for the morning when he comes in the clouds glorious son sing for the morning when he comes sing to the living God (Chorus).
